PerfectNetExp.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(GH)--石油百科 ... goodwill 商誉 googol 古戈尔 ；巨大的数字 googolplex 古戈尔派勒斯.
goodwill 商誉googol 古戈尔 ；巨大的数字googolplex 古戈尔派勒斯

list.abs: jiangsu googol electromechanical co. , ltd ., 江苏高歌机电有限公司.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: said to have been coined by the nine-year-old nephew of E. Kasner (1878–1955), American mathematician, at Kasner's request

encyclopedia.content: 单词解释 含义 googol n. 1. 10的100次方 2. 天文数字 来历 1938 年，当美国数学家爱德华‧凯斯纳（Edwards Kasner） 定义了这样一个大数准备命名时，他九岁的外甥米尔顿‧塞勒塔（Milton Sirotta） 发表意见道：“这样大的数，非得用一个怪名Googol不可。”Googol 即由此得名。 随后通过 Kasner 和 James Newman 合著的《数学与想象力》“Mathematics and the Imagination”一书广为流传。 公司名称Google公司

means.word_mean: 1. a cardinal number represented as 1 followed by 100 zeros (ten raised to the power of a hundred)

auth_sentence.content: Google, the company's name, was originally a misspelling of googol.
auth_sentence.res_content: Google, the company's name, was originally a misspelling of googol.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Google, the company's name, was originally a misspelling of googol.

auth_sentence.content: Just be careful not to open the pipe to wide lest we bring about the destruction of the universe a few googol years to early.
